amendment.description: To amend the Head Start Act to require parental consent for nonemergency intrusive physical examinations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 987 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 987 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S5699-5705) To amend the Head Start Act to require parental consent for nonemergency intrusive physical examinations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 987 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 987 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Inhofe.
